attributes.action: Make citizenship a GCSE that all students have the choice to do
attributes.background: This petition is to make citizenship (law, politics etc.) a set choice for students in year 11 to take. this would mean it would be on the curriculum in year 11 if you want to do it but it would be a part of the GCSEs that you can choose from to do.

rejection.details: Apart from compulsory subjects, it's up to schools to decide which subjects they want to offer.
